fr:title.text: Right multiplication by octonion as a matrix

fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Right multiplication by octonion as a matrix

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: It's not hard to see that L_{i}L_{i\ell } = (-R_{\ell }+R_{i}R_{i\ell }-R_{j}R_{j\ell }-R_{k}R_{k\ell })/2 and similar results for L_{j}L_{j\ell } and L_{k}L_{k\ell }. Combining results, we obtain \boxed {L_{\ell }+L_{i}L_{i\ell }+L_{j}L_{j\ell }+L_{k}L_{k\ell }=-2R_{\ell }.} This allows us to write conjugation as -L_{\ell }R_{\ell }a=\overline {a}.
